text: Login
allows a user to log in to the system
registered user
Check that username and password have length
If the condition is respected goes to point two otherwise it notifies the user error
Search in the archive if Username and password entered by the user are present among the loggable users
If the search was successful the user is logged in to the system
The system displays the registered user workspace Interruption of the connection to the SMOS server
The user is not logged in to the system the user has username and password fills out and submits the form for the login
